p.speaker: monsterkid
p.box: *Yo! *Are you sneaking out to see her, too?
*Awesome... *She's the coolest, right!?
*I wanna be just like her when I grow up...
*Hey, don't tell my parents I'm here. *Ha ha.
*OK, I'm ready when you are.

p.speaker: echoflowerexplainer
p.box: *This is an Echo Flower. *It repeats the last thing it heard, over and over...
*Neat, huh?

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *This is an Echo Flower. *It repeats the last thing it heard, over and over...

p.speaker: determination
p.box: *(The sound of rushing water fills you with determination)

p.speaker: sans
p.box: *what? *haven't you seen a guy with two jobs before?
*fortunately, two jobs means twice as many legally-required breaks.
*i'm going to grillby's. *wanna come? Yeah I'm busy

p.speaker: sans
p.box: *OK. have fun.

p.speaker: sans
p.box: > *well, if you insist... *i'll pry myself away from my work

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *(This is a box.)
*(You canput an item in or take a item out.)
*(Why would you, though???) *(You can't use items when they're in the box!)
*(Sincerely, a box hater.)

p.speaker: box
p.box: *Use the box? Yes No

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *I swore I saw something... *Behind that rushing water...

p.speaker: tutu
p.box: *(There's a tutu lying on the ground here.)
*(Will you take it?) Take it Leave it
*(You got the Old Tutu.)

conditions.box: HEY! READY TO HANG OUT WITH UNDYNE???
NORMALLY SHE RETURNS AT ABOUT THIS TIME
AND SHE'S NOT ANSWERING HER PHONE

p.speaker: napstablook
p.box: hm... i should probably try to make friends with my neighbors
she's kind of scary,but i feel like i'm always too late to make friends...
i should at least try...

p.speaker: naspstablook
p.box: I've almost got a mix cd finished for my scary neighbor...
it's 74 minutes of people screaming their signature wrestling moves
but they're all autotuned. i hope she likes it
